The "chemical" entities in the paragraph are "plasma", "blood urea nitrogen (BUN)", "creatinine", and "intravenous contrast material".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

After reviewing the previous list of entities, I have removed "plasma" and "intravenous contrast material" as they do not clearly refer to "Chemical" entities. "Plasma" is a biological fluid, and "intravenous contrast material" is a medical imaging agent, which are not chemicals. The remaining entities, "blood urea nitrogen (BUN)" and "creatinine", are chemical substances and are presented in the table above.
